other_tests.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic, compatible with diffuse steatosis. No focal liver lesions are identified. The gallbladder is moderately distended. At least 2 gallstones layer in the gallbladder neck, measuring up to 1.3 cm. The gallbladder wall is mildly thickened. Hypodensity in the adjacent liver parenchyma is compatible with either focal fatty sparing or mild pericholecystic fluid. The patient was focally tender over the gallbladder.
